MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CH1 postcode area of Chester, affecting customers on Rawson Road, Ashmuir Close and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 5.01PM. Our engineers have established that there is a fault on the underground cable network and that repairs will be complex so we are awaiting delivery of generators to restore power, and this should happen by 2.00AM. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11.56PM on 3rd January 2021
